name: part_008
file: tmp_【#バカタレ２周年記念LIVE】音楽ライブ♬　BAKATARATION PARTY【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ⧸不知火フレア⧸角巻わため】 [hQB206l932M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare performs her song 'Yakusoku no Hoshi' (The Promised Star) live on stage with mascot characters dancing in the background.

subtitles.original: 君がいる 心 それだけで
subtitles.english: You are here in my heart, and with just that,

subtitles.original: 絡みつく 闇も 光へと
subtitles.english: even the entangling darkness turns to light.

subtitles.original: 約束の 星を 抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embracing the promised star,

subtitles.original: 飛び立とう 今 輝きへと
subtitles.english: let's take flight now, towards the radiance.

subtitles.original: あの日の 空が 残した
subtitles.english: What the sky left behind on that day,

subtitles.original: 笑顔の スケッチ
subtitles.english: is a sketch of smiles.

subtitles.original: 胸の奥で 溢れたんだ
subtitles.english: Overflowing deep within my chest,

subtitles.original: こんな あたたかい 涙
subtitles.english: are these warm tears.

subtitles.original: 初めてだよ
subtitles.english: It's the first time for me.

subtitles.original: 勇気に変えて 歩いていこう
subtitles.english: Turning them into courage, let's walk on.

subtitles.original: 時の 風に 包まれ
subtitles.english: Enveloped by the winds of time,

subtitles.original: 切なく 舞う サヨナラ
subtitles.english: a sorrowful "goodbye" dances in the air.

subtitles.original: いつか また 出会えるよね
subtitles.english: We'll be able to meet again someday, right?

subtitles.original: 遠き 空に 約束
subtitles.english: A promise to the distant sky.

subtitles.original: 君がいる 心 それだけで
subtitles.english: You are here in my heart, and with just that,

subtitles.original: 絡みつく 闇も 光へと
subtitles.english: even the entangling darkness turns to light.

subtitles.original: もう二度と 迷わないよ
subtitles.english: I won't lose my way ever again.

subtitles.original: たとえ 雨が 降り続いていても
subtitles.english: Even if the rain continues to fall,

subtitles.original: 見つめたい あの 雲の行方
subtitles.english: I want to watch the path of those clouds.

subtitles.original: 追いかけて その先へ行こう
subtitles.english: Let's chase them and go beyond.

subtitles.original: 約束の 星を 抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embracing the promised star,

subtitles.original: 飛び立とう 今 輝きへと
subtitles.english: let's take flight now, towards the radiance.

subtitles.original: 新しい 靴が 痛くて
subtitles.english: My new shoes are painful,

subtitles.original: 立ち止まってしまう こともあるけどね
subtitles.english: and there are times when I stop in my tracks.

subtitles.original: 気まぐれ 雲に 差し込む
subtitles.english: Shining through the whimsical clouds,

subtitles.original: 夢の粒を
subtitles.english: grains of dreams.

subtitles.original: そっと集めて 描いていこう
subtitles.english: Let's gently collect them and paint our future.

subtitles.original: いつも 強がることで
subtitles.english: By always putting on a brave face,

subtitles.original: 強くなろうとした
subtitles.english: I tried to become strong.

subtitles.original: 足りないところがあるから
subtitles.english: Because there are parts of me that are lacking,

subtitles.original: 明日が生まれてくるんだね
subtitles.english: tomorrow is born, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 君がいる 遠く離れても
subtitles.english: You are here, even if we are far apart.

subtitles.original: こんなにも 側にある 気持ち
subtitles.english: This feeling is so close to me.

subtitles.original: もう一度 出会う その日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day we meet once more,

subtitles.original: とっておきの 自分 見つけよう
subtitles.english: I'll find the best version of myself.

subtitles.original: 忘れない 大切に触れた
subtitles.english: I won't forget the preciousness I touched,

subtitles.original: かけがえのない あの 一秒
subtitles.english: that irreplaceable second.

subtitles.original: 約束の 星に 導かれ
subtitles.english: Guided by the promised star,

subtitles.original: 続く道を 歩いていく
subtitles.english: I'll walk the path that continues.

subtitles.original: 君がいる 遠く離れても
subtitles.english: You are here, even if we are far apart.

subtitles.original: こんなにも 側にある 気持ち
subtitles.english: This feeling is so close to me.

subtitles.original: もう一度 出会う その日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day we meet once more,

subtitles.original: とっておきの 自分 見つけたい
subtitles.english: I want to find the best version of myself.

subtitles.original: 忘れない 大切に触れた
subtitles.english: I won't forget the preciousness I touched,

subtitles.original: かけがえのない あの 一秒
subtitles.english: that irreplaceable second.

subtitles.original: 約束の 星に 導かれ
subtitles.english: Guided by the promised star,

subtitles.original: 続く道を 歩いてゆけ
subtitles.english: Go forth on the path that continues.

subtitles.original: 君がいる
subtitles.english: You are here.

subtitles.original: 君がいる
subtitles.english: You are here.
